options.name: prompt
options.description: Description of the image to be generated.

options.name: negative_prompt
options.description: Describe what should not be included in the images

options.name: seed
options.description: The seed to use for the computation. Use the same seed to get the same image. Default is random.

options.name: steps
options.description: The number of iterations to complete. Higher number takes longer. Default is 4.

options.name: model
options.description: Select a model from the options below. Default is Stable Diffusion XL
